flawed_nl_solution:
The band played 5 + 7 = <<5+7=10>>10 songs in their first two sets.
They have 30 - 10 = <<30-10=20>>20 songs left for the third set, fourth set and encore.
Since they played 2 songs in the encore, they have 20 - 2 = <<20-2=18>>18 songs to play on the third and fourth sets
They will play 18 / 2 = <<18/2=9>>9 songs on average over the third and fourth sets.
#### 9

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 12, not 10. This appears to be a minor miscalculation.
